name: axi-project-dashboard
description: axi-project-dashboard - Independent deployment progress visualization dashboard

scripts.build: pnpm --filter backend build && pnpm --filter frontend build
scripts.lint: pnpm --filter backend lint && pnpm --filter frontend lint
scripts.lint:fix: pnpm --filter backend lint:fix && pnpm --filter frontend lint:fix
scripts.typecheck: pnpm --filter backend typecheck && pnpm --filter frontend typecheck

author: 运维团队
